snippet.title: 13Z: Introducing Lyra the Peerless Sword (Character Announcement Trailer / Devlog)
snippet.description:
On this devlog, we're thrilled to introduce the first challenger vying for the coveted 13th zodiac spot: Lyra the Fox. *Full devlog:*
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2348250/view/4372516525982918984

Join us as we delve into Lyra's backstory, explore her design evolution, and showcase her incredible abilities! We're also preparing for our first playtest demo so stay tuned :)

*Wishlist on Steam*
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348250/13Z/

*We'd love to hear from you!*
💟 Discord: https://discord.gg/eH7RqCVfHu
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/13z_game
👾 Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@13z.game

#hackandslash #roguelike #actiongames 

---
Hack and Slash, Roguelike, Action, Action Adventure, Coop action game
